user-service.py
body.code:
import sqlite3

def get_user(user_id):
    conn = sqlite3.connect('users.db')
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    query = f"SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = {user_id}"
    cursor.execute(query)
    return cursor.fetchone()

def delete_all_users():
    conn = sqlite3.connect('users.db')
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    cursor.execute("DELETE FROM users")
    conn.commit()
